name: 19th Edition of Global Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering & Technology
content: Magnus Group warmly invites you to join the esteemed "19th Edition of Global Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering & Technology" â€“ a Hybrid Event slated to take place in Rome, Italy from September 19-21, 2024.This hybrid format offers the flexibility to participate either in person in Rome or virtually from the comfort of your home or workplace. The conference will center around the theme "Expedite the Future Endeavours in Catalysis and Chemical Engineering" and aims to create a platform for the exchange of the latest research findings and innovative methodologies. Chemistry Conferences 2024 represent crucial facets of advanced technology, addressing both current and future industry requirements. The annual conference assembles leaders from industry, regulatory bodies, and academia to collaboratively shape a comprehensive program covering traditional and cutting-edge topics, technologies, and applications. Catalysis Conferences 2024 will bring together seasoned professionals and the next generation of industry leaders to engage in discussions, contribute ideas, and envision a bright future for the sector. This event provides a unique opportunity for senior experts and young researchers to interact and share ideas with prominent figures in the field of chemical research, gaining insights into their professional prospects and career potential. The robust social program, featuring plenary talks, keynote sessions, oral and poster presentations, will offer diverse networking opportunities. Don't miss out on this exceptional Catalysis, Chemical Engineering Conferences 2024! Detailed information: Conference: 19th Edition of Global Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering & Technology Dates: September 19-21, 2024 Venue: NH Villa Carpegna Via Pio IV, 6, 00165 Roma RM, Italy and Online Contact Email: catalysis@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +1 (540) 709 1879 Website https://catalysis-conferences.magnusgroup.org/ Catalysis Conferences 2024 | Chemical Engineering Conferences 2024 | Chemistry Conferences 2024 | Catalysis Conference | Chemical Engineering Congress | Catalysis and Reaction Engineering Symposium | Chemical Engineering Congress 2024 | Chemical Technology Workshop | Industrial Catalysis Colloquium | Catalytic Processes Seminar | Chemical Reaction Kinetics Forum | Advances in Catalysis Expo | Catalytic Materials Congress | Heterogeneous Catalysis Workshop | Chemistry Conferences 2024Events 2024 | Homogeneous Catalysis Colloquium | Chemistry Conferences 2024Events | Chemical Engineering Innovations Summit | Catalysis in Nanotechnology Workshop | Environmental Catalysis Seminar | Green and Sustainable Chemistry Expo | Chemical Synthesis and Catalysts Symposium | Biocatalysis and Biotransformation Forum | Petrochemical Engineering Colloquium | Computational Catalysis Workshop | Organometallics and Bioinorganic Chemistry Seminar | Fluid Mechanics in Catalysis Expo | Catalysis for Renewable Sources Symposium | Catalytic Cracking in Petrochemical Engineering Forum | Advances in Chemical Technology Workshop | Nuclear Chemistry and Radiochemistry Colloquium | Catalysis and Porous Materials Expo | Chemical Kinetics and Catalytic Activity Seminar | Catalysis for Energy Workshop | Catalysis and Applications Expo | Catalysis for Biorefineries Colloquium
